alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:21AM CDT until August 05 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR COWLEY COUNTY... At 620 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Douglass to near Arkansas City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Udall, Burden, Dexter, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Rock, Cambridge, Maple City, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
